Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Considering its high-quality craftsmanship and unique benefits, I propose a price of $20000 for it. I believe this investment would be well worth the value it brings to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
